name: src/tween.js
Tween
description: Class for creating a tweening animation

unknown.tagValue: Tween does not have a license at this time. For licensing contact the author

params.name: pOtions
params.description: The options for the tween animation

params.name: pOtions.start
params.description: The starting properties of the animation

params.name: pOtions.end
params.description: The end properties of the animation

params.name: pOtions.duration
params.description: The duration of the animation in milliseconds

params.name: pOtions.easing
params.description: The easing function to use for the animation

unknown.tagValue: {number} The number clamped between the minimum and maximum values

params.name: pNumber
params.description: The number to clamp

params.name: pMin
params.description: The minimum number

params.name: pMax
params.description: The maximum number

return.description: The number clamped between the minimum and maximum values

name: _hexToRgb
description: Converts an Hex color value to an array of [r, g, b].

params.name: pHex
params.description: The Hex color in the form "#fff" or "#ffffff" or tagless.

name: _rgbToHex
description: Converts an array of [r, g, b] to an Hex color code.

params.name: pColorArray
params.description:
The rgb color array to convert into a hex
return {string} The hex color

name: _build
description: Builds/Rebuilds the tween object with new info

params.name: pStart
params.description: The start object containing the start values

params.name: pEnd
params.description: The end object containing the end values

params.name: pDuration
params.description: The duration of the effect

params.name: pEasing
params.description: The easing function to use

params.name: pOtions
params.description: The options for the tween animation

params.name: pOtions.start
params.description: The starting properties of the animation

params.name: pOtions.end
params.description: The end properties of the animation

params.name: pOtions.duration
params.description: The duration of the animation in milliseconds

params.name: pOtions.easing
params.description: The easing function to use for the animation

properties.name: callback
properties.description: The function to be called when the event is triggered

name: on
description: Attaches a callback to the specified event.

params.name: pEvent
params.description: The event to attach the callback to

params.name: pCallback
params.description: The function to be called when the event is triggered

name: animate
description: Animates the tween by oscillating between the start and end properties.

params.name: pUpdate
params.description: A callback function to update the values during the oscillation.

params.name: pOscillate
params.description: A flag to indicate if the tween should oscillate.

return.description: Returns the Tween instance for method chaining.

unknown.tagValue: {Tween} The instance of the Tween object

return.description: The instance of the Tween object

unknown.tagValue: {Tween} The instance of the Tween object

return.description: The instance of the Tween object

name: stop
description: Stops the tween and clears all data.
